entity.name: Warforged
entity.entry:
When they were first encountered over a decade ago, their appearance, demeanor and, well, nearly everything about them was a shock to the Empire, but as a smallish band they were easily defeated.  Because of their uniqueness and ferocity in combat they were brought to the capital. Now, some 20 or so warforged are enslaved by the Empire, a status they feel they have earned by being defeated. 

Most seek to gain their freedom through the gladiatorial arena, but others work in menial tasks.

As a people, they seem shattered and defeated.

A small group of warforged were encountered over a decade ago and enslaved by the Empire. Many of them work in the the most menial of jobs because they don't complain and feel that they deserver to be enslaved, but there are exceptions, including Calvin's warforged who has a slightly different provenance
